00030 template<int M>
00031 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::load(const char *filename) {
00032   std::ifstream         myFile(filename);
00033   Correspondence        c;
00034   GPixel                currentProjPixel;
00035   int                   points;
00036   int                   currentCol;
00037   const double          p = 0.002; // probability of loading point
00038   const int             cameras = 5;
00039 
00040   if(!myFile) return(false);
00041   std::cout << "Loading correspondences" << std::endl;
00042 
00043   // --- count number of 3D points
00044   currentProjPixel.id = -1;
00045   points = 0;
00046   while(myFile >> c) {
00047     if(c.i != currentProjPixel) {
00048       currentProjPixel = c.i;
00049       ++points;
00050     }
00051   }
00052   std::cout <<"Found "<< points <<" points" << std::endl;
00053   Base::resize(3*M, points);
00054 
00055   // ### scan back to beginning of file ###
00056   myFile.clear();
00057   myFile.seekg(0, std::ios::beg);
00058 
00059   // --- form columns one by one
00060   // --- assuming file is ordered
00061   // --- by projector pixels.
00062   currentProjPixel.id = -1;
00063   currentCol = 0;
00064   myFile >> c;
00065   while(myFile) {
00066     if((rand()*1.0/RAND_MAX) < p) {
00067       currentProjPixel = c.i;
00068 
00069       c.i.id += cameras; // test
00070 
00071       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(0) = c.i.x;
00072       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(1) = c.i.y;
00073       pixel(c.i.id, currentCol)(2) = 1.0;
00074 
00075       //      std::cout << currentProjPixel << std::endl;
00076 
00077       do {
00078         c.j.y *= 0.75;  // test
00079         c.j.id -= 1;    // test
00080         
00081         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(0) = c.j.x;
00082         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(1) = c.j.y;
00083         pixel(c.j.id, currentCol)(2) = 1.0;
00084 
00085         myFile >> c;
00086       } while(myFile && c.i == currentProjPixel);
00087       ++currentCol;
00088     } else {
00089       // skip 3D point
00090       while(myFile >> c && c.i == currentProjPixel) {;}
00091     }
00092   }
00093   Base::conservativeResize(3*M, currentCol);
00094   std::cout <<"Loaded "<< currentCol <<" points" << std::endl;
00095   myFile.close();
00096   return(true);
00097 }

00113 template<int M>
00114 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::normalise(ImageTransform<M> &denormalisation,
00115                                      bool fixedAspect) {
00116   Eigen::Vector3d mean;
00117   Eigen::Vector2d sd;
00118   Eigen::Matrix3d K;
00119   int v;
00120   int point;
00121 
00122   unscale();
00123   K.setZero();
00124   for(v = 0; v < M; ++v) {
00125     mean = view(v).rowwise().sum();
00126     sd   = view(v).topRows(2).rowwise().squaredNorm();
00127     if(mean(2) == 0.0) mean(2) = 1.0; // no data for view
00128     sd   /= mean(2);
00129     mean /= mean(2);
00130     sd = (sd - mean.cwiseProduct(mean).topRows(2));
00131     if(fixedAspect) {
00132       sd(0) = sd(1) = (sd(0) + sd(1))*0.5;
00133     }
00134     sd = sd.cwiseSqrt();
00135 
00136     if(sd(0) == 0.0) sd(0) = 1.0;
00137     if(sd(1) == 0.0) sd(1) = 1.0;
00138 
00139     K(0,0) = 1.0/sd(0);
00140     K(1,1) = 1.0/sd(1);
00141     K(0,2) = -mean(0)/sd(0);
00142     K(1,2) = -mean(1)/sd(1);
00143     K(2,2) = 1.0;    
00144     view(v) = K*view(v);
00145 
00146     // --- form inverse
00147     K(0,0) = sd(0);
00148     K(1,1) = sd(1);
00149     K(0,2) = mean(0);
00150     K(1,2) = mean(1);
00151     denormalisation.view(v) = K;
00152   }
00153 }

00161 template<int M>
00162 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::scale_and_fill(const MotionMatrix<M> &P, 
00163                                           const ShapeMatrix &X) {
00164   int i,j;
00165 
00166   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00167     for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00168       if(pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00169         pixel(i,j) = P.view(i) * X.col(j);
00170       } else {
00171         pixel(i,j) *= (P.view(i).row(2) * X.col(j))/pixel(i,j)(2);
00172       }
00173     }
00174   }
00175 }

00183 template<int M>
00184 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::add_correspondence(const Correspondence &corr) {
00185   int icolumn = column_containing(corr.i);
00186   int jcolumn = column_containing(corr.j);
00187 
00188   if(icolumn < 0) {
00189     if(jcolumn < 0) {                    // neither exist yet
00190       icolumn = new_column();
00191       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.i);
00192       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.j);      
00193     } else {                            // j exists, i doesn't
00194       insert_pixel(jcolumn, corr.i);
00195       return(jcolumn);
00196     }
00197   } else {
00198     if(jcolumn < 0) {                    // i exists, j doesn't
00199       insert_pixel(icolumn, corr.j);
00200     } else {                            // both exist
00201       merge_columns(icolumn, jcolumn);
00202     }
00203   }
00204   return(icolumn);
00205 
00206 }

00216 template<int M>
00217 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::column_containing(const GPixel &G) {
00218   int j;
00219   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00220     if(fabs(pixel(G.id, j)(0) - G.x) < 1e-5 &&
00221        fabs(pixel(G.id, j)(1) - G.y) < 1e-5) {
00222       return(j);
00223     }
00224   }
00225   return(-1);
00226 }

00235 template<int M>
00236 typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::ViewRef MeasurementMatrix<M>::view(int i) {
00237   return(middleRows(3*i,3));
00238 }

00254 template<int M>
00255 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::synthesise_measurements(const MotionMatrix<M> &P, 
00256                                                   int pts, double noise) {
00257   ShapeMatrix           X;
00258   Eigen::Matrix4d       shift;
00259   int                   i,j;
00260 
00261   // --- fill X with homogeneous 3D points centred around origin
00262   X.resize(4,pts);
00263   for(i = 0; i<3; ++i) {
00264     for(j = 0; j<X.cols(); ++j) {
00265       X(i,j) = rand()*2.0/RAND_MAX - 1.0;
00266     }
00267   }
00268   X.row(3).fill(1.0);
00269   
00270   // --- shift centre to (0,0,1.5)
00271   shift = Eigen::Matrix4d::Identity();
00272   shift(2,3) = 1.5;
00273   X = shift*X;
00274 
00275   // --- form matrix and add noise
00276   (*this) = P*X;
00277   unscale();
00278   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00279     for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00280       (*this)(3*i,j) += 2.0*rand()*noise/RAND_MAX - noise;
00281       (*this)(3*i+1,j) += 2.0*rand()*noise/RAND_MAX - noise;
00282     }
00283   }
00284 }

00292 template<int M>
00293 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::synthesise_occlusions(double proportion) {
00294   int i,j;
00295   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00296     for(j=0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00297       if(rand()*1.0/RAND_MAX <= proportion) {
00298         pixel(i,j).fill(0.0);
00299       }
00300     }
00301   }
00302 }

00304 
00310 template<int M>
00311 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::unscale() {
00312   int i,j;
00313   
00314   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00315     for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00316       if(!pixel_is_occluded(i,j)) {
00317         pixel(i,j)(0) /= pixel(i,j)(2);
00318         pixel(i,j)(1) /= pixel(i,j)(2);
00319         pixel(i,j)(2) = 1.0;
00320       }
00321     }
00322   }
00323 }

00335 typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::PixelRef
00336 MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel(int view, int point) {
00337   return(Base::template block<3,1>(view*3,point));
00338 }
00339 template<int M>
00340 typename MeasurementMatrix<M>::constPixelRef
00341 MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel(int view, int point) const {
00342   return(Base::template block<3,1>(view*3,point));

00350 template<int M>
00351 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::pixel_is_occluded(int view, int point) const {
00352   double scale = pixel(view, point)(2);
00353   return(scale == 0.0);// && std::signbit(scale) == 0);
00354 }

00363 template<int M>
00364 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::new_column() {
00365   Base::conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()+1);
00366   return(cols()-1);
00367 }

00375 template<int M>
00376 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::new_columns(int n) {
00377   Base::conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()+n);
00378   return(cols()-n);
00379 }

00409 template<int M>
00410 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_column_and_expand(ColXpr c) {
00411   int   i,j,k;
00412   int   extracols;
00413   bool  fullyExpand[M];
00414   bool  pixelExpand[M];
00415 
00416   // --- First calculate how many cols to insert
00417   extracols = 1;
00418   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00419     if(c(3*i+2) == 0.0 && !is_fully_expanded(i)) {
00420       if(std::signbit(c(3*i+2)) == 0) {
00421         // --- full expansion
00422         fullyExpand[i] = true;
00423         pixelExpand[i] = false;
00424         extracols += 3;
00425       } else {
00426         // --- Pixel expansion
00427         fullyExpand[i] = false;
00428         pixelExpand[i] = true;
00429         ++extracols;
00430       }
00431     } else {
00432       // --- no expansion
00433       fullyExpand[i] = false;
00434       pixelExpand[i] = false;
00435     }
00436   }
00437 
00438   // --- now insert cols and fill
00439   k = j = new_columns(extracols);
00440   col(j) = c;
00441   ++j;
00442   for(i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00443     if(fullyExpand[i]) {
00444       middleCols(j,3).fill(0.0);
00445       (*this)(3*i   , j  ) = 1.0;
00446       (*this)(3*i+1 , j+1) = 1.0;
00447       (*this)(3*i+2 , j+2) = 1.0;
00448       j += 3;
00449     }
00450     else if(pixelExpand[i]) {
00451       col(j).fill(0.0);
00452       col(j)(3*i+2) = 1.0;
00453       col(j).middleRows(3*i,2) = c.middleRows(3*i,2);
00454       col(k).middleRows(3*i,3).fill(0.0);
00455       ++j;
00456     }
00457   }
00458   return(k);
00459 }

00476 template<int M>
00477 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_columns(ColsBlockXpr c) {
00478   int initialCols = cols();
00479 
00480   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, initialCols + c.cols());  
00481   middleCols(initialCols, c.cols()) = c;
00482   return(initialCols);
00483 }

00489 template<int M>
00490 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::delete_column(int i) {
00491   while(i < cols()-1) {
00492     col(i) = col(i+1);
00493   }
00494   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()-1);
00495 }

00501 template<int M>
00502 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::delete_columns(int i, int n) {
00503   while(i < cols()-n) {
00504     col(i) = col(i+n);
00505   }
00506   conservativeResize(Eigen::NoChange, cols()-n);
00507 }

00515 template<int M>
00516 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::insert_pixel(int col, const GPixel &p) {
00517   pixel(p.id, col)(0) = p.x;
00518   pixel(p.id, col)(1) = p.y;
00519   pixel(p.id, col)(2) = 1.0;
00520 }
00521 
00527 template<int M>
00528 void MeasurementMatrix<M>::merge_columns(int j1, int j2) {
00529   // --- copy pixels from j2 to j1
00530   for(int i = 0; i<M; ++i) {
00531     if(pixel(i,j1)(2) == 0.0 && pixel(i,j2)(2) != 0.0) {
00532       pixel(i,j1) = pixel(i,j2);
00533     }
00534   }
00535   delete_column(j2);
00536 }

00544 template<int M>
00545 int MeasurementMatrix<M>::rank(double threshold) {
00546   int i;
00547   Eigen::JacobiSVD<Base> svd(*this);
00548 
00549   if(svd.singularValues().size() == 0) return(0);
00550 
00551   threshold *= fabs(svd.singularValues()(0));
00552   i = 1;
00553   while(i < svd.singularValues().size() && 
00554         fabs(svd.singularValues()(i)) > threshold)
00555     ++i;
00556   return(i);
00557 }

00566 template<int M>
00567 bool MeasurementMatrix<M>::is_fully_expanded(int view) {
00568   int j;
00569 
00570   for(j = 0; j<cols(); ++j) {
00571     if(pixel(view, j)(2) == 0.0 && pixel(view, j)(0) == 1.0) return(true);
00572   }
00573   return(false);
00574 }

00579 template<int M>
00580 template<class D>
00581 MeasurementMatrix<M> &MeasurementMatrix<M>::operator=(const Eigen::MatrixBase<D> &o) {
00582   Base::operator =(o);
00583   return(*this);
